name: Croc: Legend of the Gobbos
description: Creates a Wine prefix and installs Croc: Legend of the Gobbos from a CD-ROM for Microsoft Windows. Sets some registry keys necessary to properly run the game using Direct3D.
notes:
Manual tasks:
- You must manually proceed through the installation.

- You will be required to set the resolution near the end of the script, as it was not possible to get a hexadecimal representation of screen resolution values using the script.

- When first starting the game, you may need to set key bindings (Options > Customize Controls > Redefine Controls).

Known issues:
- Game music does not play, even with disc mounted or inserted.
- Alt-tabbing will cause the application to go black.

task.description: Executing setup from disc. Select "Install Croc" and follow the prompts. Do not change the default installation directory. Select a full installation. Click "No" when asked to install DirectX. Exit the application.
task.name: wineexec

task.description: Select "Change driver settings". Use the dropdown menu under "Screen Resolution" to set resolution. Click "OK" when done. Exit the application.
task.name: wineexec

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Fox/Croc/CrocD3D.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Waiting for game installer...
    message: Insert the Croc CD-ROM disc.
    requires: autorun.exe
- task:
    description: Executing setup from disc. Select "Install Croc" and follow the prompts.
      Do not change the default installation directory. Select a full installation.
      Click "No" when asked to install DirectX. Exit the application.
    executable: $DISC/autorun.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: D3D Device
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Argonaut Software\Croc
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: DirectDraw HAL
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: D3D Mode
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Argonaut Software\Croc
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: DirectDraw HAL $RESOLUTION, 16 bit
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: D3D Resoloution
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Argonaut Software\Croc
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: $RESOLUTION, 16 bit
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: Driver name
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Argonaut Software\Croc
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: d3drend
- task:
    description: Select "Change driver settings". Use the dropdown menu under "Screen
      Resolution" to set resolution. Click "OK" when done. Exit the application.
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fox/Croc/CrocRun.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
